title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button on the JAR packager, it shows an error message saying 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When I press the 'Finish' button on the JAR packager
EB: It should successfully create the JAR file without showing any error message
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file and make some changes without saving it. 2. Open the JAR packager on the project that contains the unsaved file. 3. Enter all the necessary details such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager. 4. Click on the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file.
